message.name: NOT_IN_CLAN
message.value: Not a member of a clan

message.name: CANT_CREATE_CLAN
message.value: Unfortunately, you can't create your clan yet!

message.name: CREATE_CLAN_CONFIRMATION
message.value: So are you ready to create a clan?

message.name: CHANGE_CLAN_NAME_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Shall we change your clan's name for 5 rubies?

message.name: CHANGE_CLAN_EMBLEM_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Shall we change your clan's emblem for 5 rubies?

message.name: CHANGE_CLAN_DESCRIPTION_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Shall we change your clan's description for 5 rubies?

message.name: EXPAND_CLAN_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Are you sure you want to increase your clan's capacity?

message.name: CHANGE_CLAN_NAME_FAILED
message.value: Clan name is the same as the current one

message.name: CHANGE_CLAN_DESCRIPTION_FAILED
message.value: Clan description is the same as the current one

message.name: CHANGE_CLAN_EMBLEM_FAILED
message.value: Clan emblem is the same as the current one

message.name: ERR_CLAN_NAME_EXISTS
message.value: This name has been taken by another clan already!

message.name: ERROR_MIN_CHAR_CLAN_NAME
message.value: Clan name must be at least {value} symbols

message.name: MAX_CAPACITY_LABEL
message.value: Your clan has reached maximum capacity. You can't increase it further.

message.name: REPEATED_REQUEST_ON_NEW_LEVEL
message.value: Request for increasing capacity has been already sent.

message.name: FRIEND_ALREADY_IN_CLAN
message.value: Your friend is already in clan!

message.name: RESTRICTION_ON_RANK_AT_INVITE
message.value: Only clan leader and officers can invite new members!

message.name: ERR_REPEATED_INVITE
message.value: You've already sent an invitation to this player.

message.name: ERR_PROFILE_INVITE_LIMIT
message.value: Your friend has too much invitations already.

message.name: ERR_CLAN_INVITE_LIMIT
message.value: You can't send more invitations right now. Please, try a bit later.

message.name: ERR_INTEROP_ON_INVITE
message.value: Your friend's account is blocked, you can't invite him to the clan.

message.name: ERR_INVITE_LOW_LEVEL_FRIEND
message.value: You can't invite players below {level} level

message.name: MEMBER_WAS_EXPELLED
message.value: {name} was expelled from the clan by {subject}.

message.name: NEWS_CLAN_TITLE_LOCKED
message.value: Your clan is blocked. Change clan name and/or description to remove a block.

message.name: USER_EXPELLED_FROM_CLAN_MSG
message.value: You were removed from the clan!

message.name: CONFIRMATION_EXIT_FROM_CLAN
message.value: Are you sure to leave the clan?

message.name: CLAN_LOCKED_MESSAGE
message.value: Your clan is blocked, action is denied.

message.name: ERR_LEADER_QUIT_CLAN
message.value: Clan can only be removed, when there is 1 member remaining. Pass your leadership to an officer or remove other members.

message.name: QUIT_CLAN_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Are you sure to disband a clan?

message.name: PROMOTION_CONFIRMATION_OFFICER
message.value: Officers have the right to invite new members and remove existing ones. They can also leave a message to the clan and increase the capacity. Promote this member?

message.name: PROMOTION_CONFIRMATION_LEADER
message.value: When you promote a member to become the leader, you become an officer automatically. Do you really want to promote this member?

message.name: MIN_RATING_NEED
message.value: You have to set the minimal rating

message.name: JOIN_RATING_NOT_CHANGED
message.value: Rating value is the same as current!

message.name: CLAN_SEASON_AWARD
message.value: Fight for your clan to be the first in the season rating. Clans ranked at the top 10 will get a decent reward and the clan Banner!

message.name: CLAN_SEASON_BONUS_TEXT
message.value: Congratulations! In this season your clan has claimed {place} place and gets the clan banner! For your hard efforts you also get:

message.name: MAP_CAPACITY_FOR_JOIN_CLAN
message.value: Clan is full. Unfortunately, there is no room for you.

message.name: JOIN_CLAN_CONFIRMATION_TEXT
message.value: Are you sure you want to join {clanName}?

message.name: ERR_SOCIAL_ID
message.value: An error has occurred, please try to refresh the page with the game and the action again.

message.name: CLAN_RATING_TOO_SMALL
message.value: Clan rating is too low to determine player's contribution to it

message.name: CLAN_JOIN_DISABLE_BY_LEVEL
message.value: You must reach at least level {value} to join a clan!

dictionary.message: You have to reach {level} and score {rating} rating, to create your own clan.

message.name: CLAN_CHAT_OFFER_CREATE
message.value: You're not in clan yet, but now it's a perfect time to create your own, or find another clan to join!

message.name: PROMOTION_LEADER_FAILED
message.value: The player must get {level} level and {rating} rating to take the rulership.

message.name: ERR_ALREADY_IN_CLAN
message.value: The player is already in clan!

message.name: ERR_REQUIREMENTS_FAILURE
message.value: Account does not meet clan requirements

message.name: MEDAL_COLLECT_NOTIFY
message.value: You get medals for each {count} rating aÑquired.

message.name: MEDAL_COST_NOTIFY
message.value: From {min} to {max} rubies. There must be enough rubies for {count} medals in treasury.

message.name: CLAN_EXCHANGE_MEDAL_QUESTION
message.value: Are you sure you want to exchange {medalsCount} {medals} for {rubiesCount} {rubies}?

message.name: CLAN_OP_WALLET_SELECT
message.value: Please select the type of payment:

message.name: CLAN_MEDAL_COST_CONFIRM_COUNT
message.value: There must be at least {count} {rubies} in treasury!

message.name: ERR_EXIT_CLOSED_CLAN
message.value: Leaving this clan is forbidden. You'll be able to change the clan only during first {count} days of each season!

message.name: JOIN_TO_EXIT_CLOSED_CLAN
message.value: You are about to join the closed clan. You'll be able to leave it only during first {count} days of each season!

message.name: DONATE_CLAN_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Do you really want to donate {count} {rubies}?

message.name: ERR_DONATE_REPEAT
message.value: You've already donated today. Another donation can be made tomorrow.

message.name: NEED_FOR_COMPENSATION_MEMBER
message.value: You need rubies to return donations to player and pay for his medals.

message.name: ONLY_LEADER_CAN_EXPELL_MEMBER_WITH_COMPENSATION
message.value: Only leader can exclude a player, who made a donation or earned medals.

message.name: REQUIRE_DONATE_NOTIFY
message.value: To be able to donate, you must have at least {rubies} rubies or get {rating} rating in this season.

message.name: CLAN_TREASURY_PAY_NOTIFY_BONUS
message.value: When you're donating to your clan, you get {value}% more rubies!

message.name: CLAN_TREASURY_PAY_NOTIFY_FIRE
message.value: If you're excluded from the clan, you'll get back your donations for the last 2 seasons (without {value}% bonus).

message.name: USER_EXPELLED_COMPENSATION
message.value: You get back your clan donations: {count} {rubies}.

message.name: CLAN_MEDAL_COST_CONFIRM_WARNING
message.value: Do you really want to set the new medal reward?

message.name: CONFIRM_EXPELL_CLANMATE
message.value: Do you really want to expel this player from the clan?

message.name: TREASURY_INCOMING_PAYMENT_SUCCESS
message.value: You've successfully purchased {count} {rubies} for clan treasury.

message.name: MEMBER_GLADIATOR_COMPLETE_MESSAGE
message.value: {name} finished gladiator arena run with score {count}

message.name: CLAN_NO_ACTIVITY_THIS_MONTH
message.value: Nothing happend in the clan for the last month.

message.name: OFFICER_WAS_EXPEL_PERMISSION_ON
message.value: {name} is granted a permission to expel clan mates ({subject}).

message.name: OFFICER_WAS_EXPEL_PERMISSION_OFF
message.value: {name} is forbidden to expel clan mates ({subject}).

message.name: MEMBER_WAS_UNMUTED
message.value: {name} is able to write in clan chat ({subject}).

message.name: ERR_ACCESS_DENIED_FOR_EXPEL_CLANMATE
message.value: You are forbidden to expel clan mates.

message.name: ERR_ACCESS_DENIED_FOR_CLAN_CHAT
message.value: You are muted in clan chat.

message.name: PROMOTION_LEADER_FAILED_2
message.value: You have to remove all restrictions from officer, to pass them a leadership.

message.name: PROMOTION_OFFICER_FAILED
message.value: Can't assign another officer, you have to demote someone first.

message.name: CONFIRM_INVITE_TO_CLAN
message.value: Are you sure you want to invite this player?

message.name: BANNER_DESCRIPTION_1
message.value: The troops get +6 to attack and armor while near the banner.

message.name: BANNER_DESCRIPTION_2
message.value: The troops get +8 to attack and armor and +5 to regeneration while near the banner.

message.name: BANNER_DESCRIPTION_3
message.value: All troops on the battlefield get a speed bonus. Troops also get +8 to attack and armor and +5 to regeneration while near the banner.

message.name: BANNER_DESCRIPTION_4
message.value: All troops on the battlefield get a speed bonus and +5% to vampirism. Troops also get +8 to attack and armor and +5 to regeneration while near the banner.

message.name: BANNER_DESCRIPTION_5
message.value: All troops on the battlefield get a speed bonus and +5% to vampirism. Troops also get +10 to attack and armor and +5 to regeneration while near the banner.
